title: 【#６】　都市伝説解体センター 「崩壊と審判」　【白上フブキ/ホロライブ】
name: Shirakami Fubuki

entries.text: We're playing Urban Legend Dismantling Center again today, but...
It looks like this might be the finale?
Now, will the Great Reset happen?
And where did everyone involved disappear to?
Is it really ending with this? There isn't a secret Episode 7?
It plays in my head with Tengen-sama's voice.
My smartphone broke! This isn't funny!
No, seriously wait, the screen is weird.
The street vision is showing the same thing.
Smartphone and vision showing the same thing?
Someone find the source of this stream.
I want to become a member.
"What is something that does not exist even if you say it out loud?"
Something that doesn't exist even if spoken.
Something that doesn't exist even if spoken.
The prophecy has become a notice.
"The device in question is in our hands."
Hey, what do I do? My phone won't go back.
"What is something that does not exist even if spoken?"
Notice stream of Collapse and Judgment.
Um, you remembered it from before?
How do you have my number?
Could it be, did something happen to Jasmine-san?
Calm down, I'm coming to pick you up anyway.
Do you know what the "0th card" is?
Center person in charge, come out!
I have to tell the Center Chief.
But I can't enter the Center like this.
Calm even at a time like this.
A lot of that is right, but a lot is wrong.
"He was the culprit of that famous Ueno incident from back in the day, right?"
People who do things like that...
Their thinking is fundamentally different from normal people.
Different way of thinking, I imagine.
The scale of it is ridiculous too.
"People who get swept up in various ideologies..."
"I've been helping with that plan for a long time."
Helping with the plan... could it mean...
"The timeline is too weak lately, it's exhausting."
"You have to watch, terrorism might happen."
"Heart-down won't stop." What does that mean?
"I was able to help that person."
Do they not know his name?
"Ever since the changes to the Samejima site..."
True, someone we don't know who or where they are...
How are we supposed to catch them?
"In the end, the bunch hanging out on Samejima..."
"...they don't want to accept the reality of crime."
"Just a gathering of guys like that."
Well, what's wrong with wanting to be at peace?
Well yeah, I want to be at peace too, but...
If just saying "Peace be with you" brought peace, that'd be great.
We have to accept the reality happening now...
And face it to build peace, I guess.
Ah, "Helping that person with the plan."
"The prophecy is almost certainly going to happen."
"I've hidden it until now, but actually I'm one of the executors."
"I'm happy I could help that person."
Did they plant something like Fujiwara-san did?
"I don't know if I was able to help with the plan."
"For someone not very smart like me..."
"I don't understand what that person is thinking."
The Manager is appearing before people more than I thought.
"I just have to move as told."
"For that person to ask me for a favor..."
"I want to help again, I want to meet again."
I feel like I'm about to remember something.
"There's no way I wouldn't help change the world's values."
"That person always pushes my back just right."
What is this feeling of having my back pushed?
I feel like I've seen it somewhere...
I'm starting to feel like it's the Center Director.
"It's okay, if it's Azami-san, you can do it," she says.
Oh no, the Center Director keeps crossing my mind.
"I think the rumor about the 77.7 billion yen leak is real."
"The Jima fans are posting on the timeline praising the Manager."
To these people, the Manager is...
"I can't say too much and can't post sources, but please believe that theory."
"That a wonderful environment was given to the children..."
"I want even just the rumor to spread."
If you do one good thing, does it make it okay to do one bad thing?
"This person is right in front of me..."
"I can't say it to his face but..."
"I did exactly what that person taught me..."
"And I was able to get revenge on a guy I hated."
"I pulled out all my back teeth, but I don't regret it."
"Now I just have to build the world that person desires."
The same method the delivery man used to curse Maesaki-san?
The Manager was behind Maesaki-san's case too?
This delivery man pulled out his molars and put them in for the curse, right?
Does this mean even he was an executor instructed by the Manager?
"GR! I was asked by that person to transport gas to the Ueno underground too!"
It was all set up by the Manager.
Could it be that the cases handled by the Center so far...
Are all related to the Manager?
"There was no treasure where I went today, but..."
"Thanks to 'that person' who happened to be there, I feel like I've woken up."
"Good things seem likely to happen from now on."
I want them to stop with Great Excellent.
The "Great" is telling too much of a story.
Like an entertainer or an idol.
"Waiting with mouth open until the world turns upside down someday."
"I was waiting for something like this."
But they're mostly shut-in otaku, right?
Depending on the person, they might ask "Who is Kisaragi Tsutomu?"
He was worshiped by people in the occult circle, so he is famous.
But Kisaragi-san as an Occult Researcher...
Is that the only information available on the surface?
If they knew even a little, would their impression change?
Ah, well, if they knew his personality...
If they knew him better, yeah.
"...are just showing up bright red in the face."
"They stick their necks into occult topics..."
"Are they trying to make a quick buck?"
Oh, reactions to the Dissolution Center too?
"What's the status of posts by people who oppose this?"
Wait, being rejected equals occult being rejected...
"The Jima fans who gathered triggered by Occult..."
"...have transformed into a terror group collectively voicing dissatisfaction with the world."
"It's proof that Center staff were operating in secret to cause the exchange event."
It's a photo from our investigation!
"Wait, who was that in the video?"
"They said 'Guest', but could it be Latch?"
"Staff definitely planted them to hype it up."
Hmm, they still think it's a stunt.
That feels like such a long time ago.
"Because Kurosawa-san posted, he was erased by Center staff."
Did something happen to Kurosawa-san too?
This is a genuinely bad situation.
"It's strange that the Ueno incident caused such a huge uproar..."
"But the suppression of it was even faster."
"Did the police cover up something inconvenient?"
"Kisaragi Tsutomu-sama is the root of the bad influence, right?"
"Wait, Kisaragi Tsutomu-sama's birthday might be tomorrow."
"Seriously, if we leave it to the police, we won't make it."
"I want to get back to my daily life quickly."
"Is it true there's a character? I feel like I've seen it, but I don't know."
The main thing is the relationship between the Center's cases and the Manager.
If the Manager really did something behind the scenes of past cases...
There might be traces left at the scenes.
The Illumina Cards were made by the Manager.
And there was always a card at the cases so far.
Let's go to the scenes we investigated until now...
Time to look back on previous cases!
I came to the nearest place first.
Are there really traces of the Manager here?
Eh, ah, Manager-san, could it be...
I haven't come enough to say "long time no see" though.
Well then, shall I take a look? Search.
Just a bench, same as back then.
Nothing there, same as back then.
It was around here that I first met Tomiiri-san.
If she had just spoken to me normally...
I wouldn't have been so scared.
Kinoko-san grabbed my leg from these bushes, right?
Actually, the bruise remained for a while after that.
Next time I meet Kinoko-san, I'll have him apologize again.
What kind of traces... have things changed?
I can't see Tomiiri-san's traces anymore.
Instead, I see a different shadow.
It's not strange for traces to remain.
I thought it was my doppelganger for a second and panicked.
Might be good to ask the park manager (old man).
Did he come to a place like this in those clothes?
True, did he come in those clothes?
Even for the Manager, I'm glad it went as expected.
I have to chase the traces.
What on earth did the Manager do to Hyuga-san?
But was he really here in this form?
I'm worried if I'm seeing the right thing.
The park manager old man might know something.
"Did a strange person in white clothes come by?"
"Yes, with their face covered by a cloth."
"I think he was talking to a woman who was often here."
"If someone like that was here, I'd notice immediately."
"I haven't seen that Hyuga-san lately either."
"Even if he came, I feel like he was only talking to you."
"Hospital patients sneaking out to smoke and such."
"You came here too, so you know."
Doesn't seem to have changed since the ghost commotion.
Something terrible is happening right now...
"I was surprised, thought my phone broke."
You wouldn't know even if I said Kisaragi Tsutomu.
"I say I know him, but I knew that person as 'Chi-kun'."
"I used to work in delivery, bringing school lunches and such."
"I met 'Ojii' (Old man/Grandpa) and Chi-kun during deliveries."
"They call it a children's home now?"
"It's a story from over 10 years ago."
Church... Maybe the place where the Kisaragi siblings were.
"During delivery, I was suddenly spoken to by a towel-boy whose eyes were hidden."
"Spoken to by a towel-boy with hidden eyes..."
Don't tell me that's the "Secret Society Planning"...
"'Do you work for schools?' and such."
"'How do I get a job' and so on."
"I don't know if he was interested in schools..."
"But talking to him, he was a really smart kid."
"It was a shame he passed away."
I wonder if I can go to the church location.
I'll go to Nishiya's house for now.
Got in because the door was unlocked.
Since Nishiya-san was taken by ambulance...
Like the Jima fans, Nishiya-san posted about "That Person".
There might be traces of the Manager.
Are these traces from after I investigated?
Looking at my own traces, it looks like a doppelganger.
Looking again, was this shadow the Delivery Man's trace?
Does it mean the traces of handing over the delivery are clearly left?
But if so, the Manager hasn't come here either?
Possibility of some interaction even if he didn't come.
Something like a "Resale Manual" and several notebooks.
Locations visited and locations planned to visit.
Like a notebook summarizing where treasures are.
Visiting bankrupt businesses and abandoned schools.
The last place Nishiya-san went to was a church! Came here!
"It was near the station, so hopes for the ruins were low."
"I've gone around ruins, but a church is a first."
"But there was a dangerous person there."
"I can seriously call this a fateful encounter."
"The delivery man Ito-san was a comrade too."
"I want to thank him for this introduction."
Came all the way here from Ueno Park.
I never thought I'd come back here.
I have to find the Manager's traces.
What feelings did he have while preparing the plan...
This means it's Nomura-san's shadow during plan preparation.
Does this person really travel in this outfit?
What are these traces from doing? Let's check.
Looks like a place where bugs and rats would appear.
This iron grate looked like it could come off during the tour, I was curious.
There was a device inside the vent.
Ah, and there was a voice recorder.
The gas generator is too big to move...
If I charge it a bit with a mobile battery, it might work.
What kind of voice is on it?
It's the same voice as the Manager from the stream.
"The man with the bruise on his arm."
"If we match the dates, we won't let the culprit escape."
Clack-clack sounds making it hard to hear.
"At the gas generator placed in the grate."
"Moving on to the explanation for that."
"It's okay, if it's you, it will go well."
It seems to go on, but...
With the owners of the No. 5 coins and installing the machine.
I think that's what it means.
An old church, or rather an abandoned church near the train tracks.
The front door is unlocked, could it be...
There were posts on SNS worrying about Kurosawa-san too.
It's an emergency so pardon the intrusion.
Does this mean he kidnapped him?
So the Manager had already come here.
There is Kurosawa-san's shadow here but...
No, Kurosawa-san is being cornered by the Manager.
This might be the last of the last time.
The computer power is left on.
Was he working on the computer?
What was that HDD stolen from this room in the end?
I'm curious, but I can't get an answer right now.
Ah, the photo of Kurosawa-san and Kisaragi-san is thrown away again.
If something happened, Kurosawa-san might have thrown things away.
Lots of letters are thrown away.
"I will let you all stand on the main stage too."
"Apologize to my brother at the church cemetery."
"If you can come, I will be waiting."
"Preparations to pick you up are also complete."
This is a threat letter from the Manager.
Judging from the shadows, Kurosawa-san didn't go.
So the Manager came to pick him up.
Let's find the location of the church.
Based on the investigation so far, where is the Manager?
Traces of interaction with the Manager remained in various places.
There was no decisive info, but...
We can guess to some extent from the stories that came up repeatedly.
A place where the Manager is likely to be right now...
Is he at an abandoned church near the train tracks?
Is he at an abandoned church near the train tracks?
This doesn't narrow it down completely.
Was there anywhere else I could investigate?
Right, let's go to Mio's room.
Mio was acting strange back then too.
There might be traces of interaction.
So we go back to the beginning?
Leaving other possible spots aside for a moment...
Alright, let's go to Mio's room.
Can't believe she's still living in this room.
"I wasn't allowed to leave this vacant room in the building."
"I can't go back to my parents' home, and I can't find a new place so quickly."
I see, we haven't contacted each other lately.
"Don't worry about it, I'm glad I could live without worrying about others for a while."
Maybe because the Center Director said in the video that she was forced to move.
"You came to talk about something, right?"
Let's start by explaining the situation.
Sorry Mio, I can't stay long.
"I can tell by looking at your face."
"Next time you come, let's talk leisurely."
There's so much I want to talk about.
The room was so red, but she cleaned it up this much.
Doesn't seem to be anything in particular.
A man will never appear from here again.
It was so bloody, but it's been cleaned up quite a bit.
Did she throw most of it away?
Only one bright red book remains.
This might be the book I found during the investigation.
It wasn't a bookmark but a memo.
Wait, this isn't just one sheet.
If Mio prepared the blood in the room following these instructions...
"I understand the fear of having no place to belong."
"I understand the pain of being targeted by curiosity wherever you go."
"You decided it was okay even if you were wrong."
"You don't need to seek understanding from others, I understand."
"At that place where we first met, I will listen anytime."
It's a letter from the Manager of Samejima, isn't it?
"I don't know how Mio met the Manager..."
"And I won't ask about spreading blood following this letter right now."
Mio, tell me if you know.
Where is the Manager of Samejima?
I was able to guess somewhat, but there's no time.
An unused church near the train tracks.
Maybe because I overlooked various things.
Maybe there was evidence over there.
The kind where the Kurosawa family lines up their awards.
"100,000 Subscribers Silver Play Button: Five Society-sama."
"1 Million Subscribers Silver Play Button: Five Society-sama."
I didn't think anything of it when I saw it before, but...
The true culprits of the Pole Incident.
Come to think of it, in Kisaragi-san's memo...
Eh, the fact that this is here means...
It wasn't just a coincidence of name.
I have to go stop the Manager.
Does Mio happen to know the Manager's circumstances?
"If there is even one person who understands you..."
"I think it saves you a lot."
"I want to be like that too."
"I think I have to stop him."
"Probably wouldn't want his sibling to do such things."
"It means you want to believe, huh."
Doesn't seem to be used anymore but...
Then the person here might be...
In a sense, five... five people.
Does this mean everyone together is the 5 Society?
"Is it okay? I'll make it easier for you now."
"You must have gone through something terrible."
Wait, "make it easier", isn't that a bit...
"I want to clear Kisaragi Tsutomu's regrets."
"Let's dissolve (Kaitai) it in front of the Manager."
The Manager of Samejima is watching you from somewhere.
"Manager of Samejima, yes, I am your understander."
"I will answer with information gained from the investigation and what I've seen of you."
"Please listen and see if I understand correctly."
The countdown has less than 10 minutes left.
Let's go with the final dissolution.
Everything started from the Zero Card.
Kisaragi Tsutomu's death was distorted by occult topics.
The guided public became interested in the prophecy.
"That a criminal prophesied the time of death..."
"For the layer of people who thought Kisaragi was the culprit..."
"But for those who know the truth, it is unforgivable."
What is indispensable for the staging of this revenge plan triggered by the Zero Card?
Indispensable for the revenge plan's staging is the Illumina Card.
"It's not that the prophecy comes true, but that it mimics the background of having an executor."
"A card that could only be made by the Manager who knows the truth."
"The Zero Card that supposedly predicted Kisaragi's death."
"Now that we trace it back, what a silly trick."
Next, about the answer to the riddle.
Azami-san posted the answer on the site and got it right.
Yes, the answer was the Ueno Pole Incident.
"The Manager of Samejima called for this riddle solving on stream."
"He wanted to let the world know that this riddle is something to be solved."
Then, Azami-san, regarding the Ueno Pole Incident.
Why did this incident become something that doesn't exist even if spoken of?
Because it was made an unsolved case.
And sent it to the "Closet" as an unsolved case.
"Once stored there, pressure is applied to various places..."
"To make the incident that definitely happened disappear."
"Even if they don't know the answer, the goal is for mass interest to gather on the question."
"Because a respondent appearing brings the hidden darkness..."
We mentioned the closet, is that okay?
Then let's press further on this answer.
Why did the then Deputy Superintendent Kurosawa stop the investigation?
"He must have been made to realize something significant."
And decide to pretend the incident never happened.
What was Kurosawa Seiji's reason for judgment?
"Because it was an incident he caused himself."
"Because the one who caused it was a relative."
It was an incident he caused himself?
But I feel like I can't discard that possibility.
Sorry for the info I gathered.
It's a relative, right? A relative.
I think there was a relative among those who caused the incident.
A crime committed when Kurosawa-san was a student.
To cover that up, he erased the whole incident.
No, that's wrong... I got stabbed pretty hard there.
"Information that should fit the conclusion of an incident..."
"Thinking sacrifices are unavoidable to protect relatives..."
"I wish they would keep their justice to themselves."
"Is it about time we touch upon it?"
"In the Ueno Pole Incident, mistaking Nomura Kengo, who happened to be there..."
"And driving Kisaragi Tsutomu, who noticed all the cover-ups, to his death."
"A 5-person student group active as vigilante streamers."
"A group of 5 students from 7 years ago."
I found a streamer trophy at Kurosawa-san's house.
Also, the person with the bruise on their arm that Nomura-san was looking for...
I believe is among these members.
"The people captured here are the members of Five Society."
"Wait a minute! What are you saying on your own?!"
"This is being streamed on Kokoneros! Don't say random things!"
"Yes, it seems the Manager of Samejima is streaming."
"If you say any more, I'll sue you!"
"That's right, we were made to drink strange medicine..."
"I'll expose everything about you on my channel!"
"So what if there's a bruise on the arm?"
"Shall I put one on your arm right now?"
"You'll just follow the same path as Kisaragi."
"You have gone around the scenes so far."
"The undeniable evidence pointing to the culprit."
"Kurosawa-san, you have an idea, don't you?"
Kurosawa-san, do you have an idea?
"What is the undeniable evidence pointing to the culprit..."
"...that the culprit likely holds right now?"
"Isn't it the HDD stolen from Kurosawa-san's room by the Doppelganger?"
"In there, information that absolutely must not get out for the culprit..."
"Azami-san, I am proud to have made you a Center Investigator."
"You have gotten to know me well from 7 years ago to now."
"As expected, you seem to be my good understander."
"I shall stream the contents of the HDD."
"Stop it! That's wrong! Don't stream it!"
"You promised to delete it back then!"
"This is precious footage from 7 years ago."
"Lego inside this scum's shoes! Ora! Dangerous!"
"If you want to talk about being killed..."
"It was the public! It was you guys!"
"If you feed them the information they want..."
"Azami, are you okay? I was right to come pick you up!"
"The police seem to have made it in time..."
"Let's leave these 5 and the Manager to them."
And, how do I say this...
I can't accept the current dissolution!
By unraveling strange phenomena thought to be urban legends...
It became clear who did what.
"This case became clear too, didn't it?"
Who and what is this dissolution for?
To show that you are the Manager's understander.
"For that purpose, I opened the lock."
We haven't dissolved what truly needs dissolving.
"Azami-san, just what are you trying to do?"
My doubt. That is what needs to be dissolved.
In the previous dissolution, the target was wrong.
Dissolving the rumors of the Ueno Pole Incident that was made vague...
And revealing what happened wasn't wrong.
But we haven't touched on the important thing.
"Then Azami-san, what exactly do you think should be dissolved?"
Kurosawa-san's school... I want to dissolve that, want to do a "One Day Coverage" kind of thing, but the executors, no...
The Manager's true identity, remaining unknown!
It's about who the Manager is.
We know he is Kisaragi Tsutomu's brother, but even if police try to investigate, no records are left.
To become the Manager's understander, I think we need to get close to that.
"To think I'd hear such an answer from Azami-san."
"Closing in on the actual state of the Manager whom we've only seen on video."
"A dissolution for that purpose, is it?"
"Yes, let's close in on the Manager's actual state."
"Closing in on the true identity of a Mystery whose existence is uncertain."
"This is my first time with such a dissolution, I'm getting excited."
"Oops, no good, my bad habit is showing."
"I must throw questions to draw out Azami-san's answers."
The incident the Manager caused this time isn't his first.
"This is also a non-existent incident sent to the Closet..."
"But it is an important incident proving his existence."
Happy 77.7 Billion Yen. Ueno Pole Incident.
The "Happy 77.7 Billion Yen Leak Incident" caused by a genius hacker.
"It's the Happy 77.7 Billion Yen Leak Incident."
Only rumors remained on SNS and the Samejima site...
But files were stored in the Closet.
This means it's not a made-up story, but an actual event.
"It's difficult to prove existence with traces visualized by 'Nenshi' (thoughtography)..."
"But this is an actual event stored by police as a case, even if in the Closet."
"By digging into this, we might be able to grab the Manager's tail."
Then let's proceed further with the dissolution.
In the Happy 77.7 Billion Yen Leak Incident...
A membership-based SNS used by many celebrities, wealthy people, and politicians was targeted.
What was the name of the hacking tool used in this incident?
What we know from the Closet records is...
That this tool can only be used by its creator.
And the user was called a genius hacker.
If the Manager is the culprit of the incident...
The creator of this tool is undoubtedly the Manager.
"A special tool only the creator can use."
"This tool becomes a big hint to narrow down the culprit to one person from the many hackers."
Being a genius is something to think about too.
We know the Manager caused an incident in the past...
And used a special tool called Natasha Sign which only the creator can use.
This feels like we're stepping into the Manager's identity, but also not.
When I found this info in the Closet...
I feel like I know a time when Natasha Sign was used.
When was the time Natasha Sign was used?
It's the Ueno Otherworld Tour Lottery.
Originally, the organizer Nomura-san should have grasped everything.
But when we first met, we weren't thought to be participants.
And the handouts prepared for the number of participants weren't enough.
I think this means the organizer account Nomura-san used was hacked...
"Being able to bring everything to light without leaving anything out like this..."
"Is something only possible because it's you."
"Might cease to exist, or rather, I feel like you could make them disappear."
"Oops, excuse me, my bad habit again."
"But I can't suppress this excitement anymore."
"Then Azami-san, this will be the final question."
"Hiding from the world, inciting fear with prophecy cards..."
"Who is the person who turned their existence into the Mystery called the Masked Manager..."
"...for the sake of their brother's revenge plan?"
I want to pick Tomiiri-san here though.
No, at this point, it has to be you.
So everything refers to the Center Director?
"I couldn't object to my brother's choice."
"The world swayed brilliantly to Kurosawa's guidance."
"Every day the timeline was excited with the 'Kisaragi Tsutomu Culprit Theory'."
"Even with baseless rumors and slander stabbing at his mind daily..."
"When that was directed at me, or our parents who were already gone..."
"My brother thought he shouldn't endure it."
Your big brother who endured even that is amazing.
Everyone, let's live being careful with words.
You can kill people with words.
"He started thinking that his existence caused his family suffering."
"There is no resolution to the case without police cooperation."
"As long as the case isn't resolved..."
"The attacks on his family from the world won't stop."
"Center Director-san, you were watching all of that."
"Everything I did to try and cheer up my brother..."
"Rumors and occult stories I always talked about with my brother..."
"I did it thinking it was good back then."
"Kisaragi-san wanted to return to how it was."
"Like when you spent time at the orphanage."
"But he couldn't find the answer on how to do it."
"He didn't want to distort what you enjoyed as siblings."
"If Kisaragi-san knew his regret continued in the form of a grudge..."
"Their deeds have all been revealed in this stream."
"Kisaragi-san's bad rumors will disappear with this."
"I'm ending the revenge on those 5 now."
"Just now Kurosawa said something like this."
"'If you feed them the information they want, they jump on it without thinking.'"
"It wasn't just those 5 who drove my brother to suicide."
"Who killed my brother were ordinary people who believe themselves to be justice."
"Azami-san, you should have experienced the same thing."
"You posted a call to correct that, didn't you?"
When bad rumors about Mio were spreading...
But I think Azami did the right thing.
I understand getting bashed like "Are you on their side?"
I think saying it for them is important.
I think that's what a friend is.
"Taking in even wrong information without caring."
"Seeking and creating a villain like an idol."
"And by beating it down, they feel like they created peace."
"Those deemed evil are beaten down, but..."
"Not even a slight change happens in the world."
"Is there any other terrifying mystery (Kaiki) like this?"
There is no mystery more terrifying than this.
It's scarier than any paranormal phenomenon.
Why does it become like this... scary.
The darkness of the internet... or rather...
The internet is the darkness of the human heart.
"Because it's the internet, it's okay" or...
"This guy is doing bad things so it's natural to fight him."
A world that treats someone as a villain on rumors alone is too scary.
Scary... Humans are the most terrifying after all.
I want to make sure I don't become like that.
Not getting swept up by rumors.
"If they seek it, it should be a Mystery (Kai)."
"Center Director-san, why did you pick me?"
"Azami-san, you are outside of hatred and despair..."
"You are a truly kind human being who stands outside hatred and despair."
What's this? The screen changed on its own again.
No good, it won't react wherever I touch.
Eh wait, if this gets seen, it's bad!
"My credit card had a fingerprint authentication issued on its own!"
